snippet: Don’t be fooled. Cheating isn’t just a potential dream-buster in Major League Baseball. It can derail teenage Scrabble players, too.
abstract: Editorial draws a comparison between San Francisco Giants outfielder Melky Cabrera, who has been suspended for doping, and a young Scrabble player who was ejected from the national championship for cheating.
lead_paragraph: Don’t be fooled. Cheating isn’t just a potential dream-buster in Major League Baseball. It can derail teenage Scrabble players, too.

headline.seo: It’s How You Play the Game
headline.main: It’s How You Play the Game
headline.print_headline: It’s How You Play the Game
